00026 #define _PHYSICS_TERRAIN_

00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 #include <physics/ComplexShape>
00030 #include <physics/HeightField>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace physics {
00034 
00035 
00036 class Terrain : virtual public ComplexShape
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   Terrain() {}
00040   Terrain(const Terrain& t) {}
00041   virtual ~Terrain() {}
00042   
00043   virtual void loadMap(ref<base::VFile> mapfile) throw(std::invalid_argument, base::io_error) = 0;
00044   virtual void loadHeightField(ref<HeightField> heightfield) throw(std::invalid_argument, base::io_error) = 0;
00045 
00046   virtual void setHeight(Real x, Real y, Real h) throw(std::out_of_range) = 0;
00047   virtual Real getHeight(Real x, Real y) const   throw(std::out_of_range) = 0;
00048 
00049   virtual base::Dimension3 getDimension() const = 0;
00050 };
